id.description:
Brick Accountant from the suburbs of the capital; his insistence on following rules got in the way of their corruption. Exiled to Băo Jiāng with the impossible task of reducing graft. Tall and wide, but not fat. Bookish, not brutish.
Followed by Chen while investigating graft. She secretly aided him illegally, but he's too naive to notice. Chén dá yù stole [Jenn's PC]'s statue from the Mother-In-Law's estate sale, which is how Fungible 周 came to possess it. Followed around by Hóng Mó, who appreciates having been "rescued" from the Silken Shadows.

gadget.name: Stone Tiger 武術
gadget.notes: Careful, Forceful: Stone Tiger practitioners meld solid defenses and aggressive attacks into an erratic but effective style. There are few movements in Stone Tiger that are not designed to block a blow or crush an opponent, making it a disconcerting mix of stillness and savagery. Stone Tigers favor strikes that can be easily and effectively delivered following a defense, including low kicks, short-ranged punches and open hand claw strikes.

You can invoke Dwarven Shield-Maiden when a nearby ally suffers an attack. When you do, redirect that attack to yourself. Your defense is Average (+1) against that attack.
Because I am Death's silent hand, once per session, when I strike an unaware target from hiding, I may require that target to take the hit without the benefit of their stress track.
Once per session, when facing a challenge, you may perform a magic ritual to automatically succeed with style at any one component task of the challenge.
